name: Espresso
description: A strong and bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.
long_description: Espresso is the essence of coffee in its purest form. Prepared by forcing pressurized hot water through finely-ground coffee beans, it delivers a rich, bold flavor that coffee enthusiasts love. It's the base for many other coffee drinks and a perfect pick-me-up for any time of the day.

name: Iced Latte
description: A creamy and refreshing coffee made with espresso, milk, and served over ice.
long_description: Iced Latte is the ultimate creamy and refreshing drink for hot days. It combines the strength of espresso with the smoothness of milk, served chilled over ice. Perfect for coffee lovers who enjoy a lighter, milk-forward flavor with a cooling touch.

name: Cappuccino
description: A popular Italian coffee with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.
long_description: Cappuccino is an Italian classic, beloved worldwide for its perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and a thick layer of frothy milk foam. This drink offers a rich coffee flavor with a velvety texture, making it a great choice for coffee enthusiasts who appreciate a luxurious experience.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth and naturally sweet coffee made by steeping coarsely ground beans in cold water.
long_description: Cold Brew is a refreshing and smooth coffee, naturally sweeter than traditional brews. Made by steeping coarsely ground beans in cold water for an extended period, it delivers a less acidic and highly flavorful drink, perfect for those who enjoy coffee on a hot day.

name: Flat White
description: A silky coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, without the foam of a cappuccino.
long_description: Flat White is a coffee drink that offers a perfect harmony of espresso and steamed milk. Unlike a cappuccino, it lacks foam, giving it a silky and smooth texture. It's ideal for those who appreciate a strong coffee flavor balanced with the creaminess of milk.

name: Americano
description: A diluted espresso drink that combines a shot of espresso with hot water.
long_description: Americano is a simple yet elegant coffee drink. Created by diluting a shot of espresso with hot water, it results in a lighter and smoother flavor. This drink is perfect for those who enjoy the rich taste of espresso but prefer a less intense experience.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.
long_description: Mocha is a delightful fusion of coffee and chocolate. This drink combines the robust flavor of espresso with the sweetness of steamed milk and rich chocolate syrup, creating a dessert-like coffee that’s perfect for satisfying a sweet tooth.

name: Affogato
description: A decadent coffee dessert where hot espresso is poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
long_description: Affogato is a luxurious dessert and coffee experience in one. It features a shot of hot espresso poured over a scoop of creamy vanilla ice cream, creating a perfect blend of bold coffee flavor and sweet indulgence. A treat for special occasions or just because!

name: Macchiato
description: An espresso drink with a small amount of foamed milk on top.
long_description: Macchiato, meaning 'stained' in Italian, is a simple yet satisfying coffee drink. It consists of a shot of espresso topped with a small dollop of foamed milk, providing a bold coffee flavor with just a hint of creamy smoothness.

name: Iced Mocha
description: A refreshing mix of espresso, chocolate, and milk served over ice.
long_description: Iced Mocha combines the richness of espresso, the sweetness of chocolate, and the creaminess of milk, served over ice for a refreshing coffee experience. It's a delightful option for hot days when you need both a caffeine boost and a sweet treat.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional Middle Eastern coffee prepared with finely ground coffee beans and brewed in a cezve.
long_description: Turkish Coffee is a deeply traditional and aromatic coffee experience. Brewed in a cezve, it uses finely ground coffee beans and delivers an intense, unfiltered flavor. Often served with a sweet treat on the side, it’s a ritual as much as a beverage.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen for a creamy texture and smooth taste.
long_description: Nitro Cold Brew takes cold brew coffee to the next level by infusing it with nitrogen. This process creates a creamy texture and a smooth, velvety taste, served on tap like beer. It's an innovative and refreshing way to enjoy coffee.
